Description:
Cosy Home with a Place to Tinker
Nestled in a quiet street a short stroll to the bus stop and health clinic in Hope Street is this home with many extras including car storage and shedding. With heaps of charm you could not go wrong for an affordable downsizer or investment with an appraised return of $250 - $260 per week. Well presented from the street with low maintenance gardens, the front of the home has protection from the afternoon sun with a front verandah and shade awnings. Entering through the front a light filled lounge adjoins the dining/kitchen area that then looks over a decked & enclosed undercover area, perfect to sit for that morning cup of coffee or protect those precious pot plants. Towards the back of the home are two bedrooms the main with 3 door built in robes while the smart design of the bathroom includes a european laundry saving on space.
Other internal features include;
Gas wall furnace & reverse cyle air conditioner
Ceiling fans in most rooms
Security doors on entry points
Kitchen with all gas cook top and pantry
On the block measuring approximately 630m2
the secure yard has side car access but the real bonus is the carport that can house 3 cars or you can drive through to the 8mtr x 6mtr shed designed for tinkering complete with a concrete floor and power. An undercover area and chook/dog run out the back provides flexibility for use or remove them and you could create room for a nice lawn or plenty of vege patches. Call our friendly team to inspect today
Insights: 27 Thomas Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, modern home with presentation plus
This privately constructed, one-year old home is loaded with appealing features for first home buyers, downsizers or retirees. It is so close to new, you can practically smell the fresh paintwork.
The modern design incorporates a stylish front entry complete with stacked-stone trimmed portico while inside, it has three good-sized bedrooms - main suite at the front includes ceiling fan, walk-in robe and chic ensuite with twin vanity basins and 1200mm shower. The family bathroom lies between two remaining bedrooms and boasts a relaxing corner spa bath.
At the end of the central hallway, the open-plan kitchen, dining and living area provide a spacious and light-filled living hub overlooking the big backyard.
The modern galley-style kitchen features sleek black cabinetry topped with marble-look benches, stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. The meals and generous living space open to the covered alfresco area for easy outdoor living or entertaining.
Split system heating and cooling controls the internal temperature, the double auto garage has direct access to the laundry and a roller door to the rear yard.
Low maintenance yard is perfect for the downsizer or retiree to lock and leave and Colorbond fencing all round will keep toddlers or pets secured.
Set on a service road close to all your everyday needs including shops, transport, schools, walking/bike riding tracks and sporting facilities.

Description:
Perfect downsizer or investment opportunity
Whether you're downsizing, starting out or investing, this brilliant low-maintenance property will suit a variety of buyers.
Offering 3 bedrooms, main with walk-in robe and the additional bonus of dual-access to the main bathroom.
The other bedrooms have built-in robes.
An abundance of heating and cooling options keeps the home comfortable in all seasons, with ducted gas heating, gas wall furnace, evaporative cooling plus split system heating/cooling. Up-to-date mod cons can be found in the kitchen, as well as stone bench tops and good storage. The family/meals area opens out to an undercover alfresco deck, perfectly positioned to capture the morning sun.
This terrific property comes with many bonuses, including being freshly repainted, with quality drapes, blinds and outdoor awnings. New bamboo flooring and French doors enhance the sleek updated decor.
The landscaped block is low-maintenance and fully-enclosed, plus the carport has a handy remote-controlled door. Conveniently located within a short distance to shopping complexes and public transport, this property is ideally placed for Melbourne commuting via the highway or train.
If you're searching for an easy-care home to live in or a low-maintenance investment, an inspection will impress. Call today.

Description:
Immaculately Maintained
Sitting pretty on a corner block of 884m2 is this delightful family home. The brick veneer residence is made up of three decent size bedrooms, one with built in robes and the main with a walk in robe as well as an ensuite with a big walk in shower, while the main monochrome bathroom has a corner shower, vanity as well as a spa bath.
The living space within the home is spacious and comfortable with raked ceilings, highlight windows, updated carpet and also features a solid fuel heater. Adjoining is the kitchen comprising new granite bench tops, dishwasher, gas cooking, ample storage and a great wrap around bench.
Under the original roof line and part of the house is a workshop that is accessed from the back yard that has the most immaculately maintained garden you will ever see, low maintenance but idyllic. There is a lovely secluded courtyard, vegetable gardens, garden shed as well as a double carport.
Other features include;
A large reverse cycle air conditioner
Solar panel system
Retractable window awnings on most windows
Security doors
Not to be looked passed, this home is made for families, nothing to do inside or out but enjoy.

Description:
Presentation Plus, In Quiet Court Location.
Rarely do you come across such a well-presented home in a quiet court location. This brick home features three bedrooms, the main with an ensuite and built in robes, the two other bedrooms also have built in robes. There is a study/office, near new carpets and has been freshly painted throughout; NBN is connected and has an excellent speed. Other features include ducted evaporative cooling throughout, two separate living areas, one that leads out to an entertaining area overlooking a picturesque garden. Good off-street parking, with vehicle access through the double garage into the rear yard, provides security for a tradie's trailer plus there is an extra garden shed. All local amenities are within walking distance, including a 7 day medical center, post office, banks, supermarket, etc. Paved bush walking/riding tracks to Crusoe Reservoir and nearby scenic Gateway Park, the soon to be completed 50 meter indoor pool/gym, and schools are within walking distance. A council park playground is located behind the house. Easy access to Melbourne and excellent parking at Kangaroo Flat train station. An inspection will impress.

Description:
Family Home and 100m2+ Shed on 1180m2
Set in a quiet court in a beautifully landscaped and private mature garden this delightful and well cared for home offers 4 bedrooms and much more. The gardens are lovely, the covered entertainment area is private, there is a gated double carport, and the HUGE 13m x 7m shed with separate lockable workshop is every mans dream (and quite a few womens as well!)
The home offers an ensuite bathroom and walk-in robe to the master bedroom, with built-in robes to the other 3. There are both formal and informal living areas, an excellent 3 piece bathroom with separate W.C. and a large laundry. The kitchen enjoys good storage with double door pantry, breakfast bar, gas hot plates, rangehood and electric wall oven and has access to the dining area.
The extras are plenty - gas heating, split system air conditioning, ceiling fans, external blinds and security roller shutters throughout plus a rainwater tank, garden shed, an A frame cubby house for the children, and a secluded lawn area.
All this just a few short minutes drive from schools, medical centres, swimming pool, Lansell Plaza, Bunnings, Aldi and Bendigo CBD. This should not be missed!

Description:
Designer Home - Exclusive Estate
Set in the exclusive Bayambee Rises Estate this fantastic home of just on 7 years young is walking distance to Lansell Square Shopping Centre.
This quality built steel framed JG King home comprising of 3 bedrooms with study or 4th bedroom.
Two brand new Rev Cycle Air Con appointed in the living and master bedroom featuring full ensuite and walk in robe. Ducted heating appointed throughout
The Chef’s Kitchen features Stainless Steel appliances that includes a dishwasher.
There’s a large under cover concrete patio area to entertaining guests in the summer months ahead.
Enjoying a semi recessed setback from the street the home has a split-level block of land. At the rear there looks like enough room to add a pool, granny flat, shed etc, and bonus car access that looks like it can easily be acquired.
The home has room for 2 cars in the LUG with direct security access to the home and more in the drive way and plenty off street
Vacant possession is estimated to be available approx. 11th of December 2017 ready for the new owner and their Christmas Tree
Inspections are by appointment so please call Patricia 0426 811551 OR William 0417321688

Description:
Bushland sanctuary minutes from conveniences
Nestled within a bushland sanctuary is a family habitat ideal for a first home, or buyers retiring from acreage and unwilling to drastically diminish their outdoor oasis. Inviting birds to feast upon the nectar of native flora, long ago planted and now thriving established gardens require minimal upkeep at this address. Nearby Forest Lake welcomes walkers to wander its banks enjoying wildlife experiences when swans raise their fluffy cygnets, ducklings dash past paddling with stealth, or roos bound by at dawn and dusk.
Bluestone-toned awnings shade front bay windows of the red brick exterior that also provides the convenience of a double carport. Indoors, 2 living zones are separated by a kitchen equipped with gas cooktop, electric oven and a dishwasher. Direct access is available to the family bathroom from the main bedroom and ducted heating keeps the entire home cosy in cool weather.
Paved and undercover, an immense outdoor entertaining area allows full appreciation of the picturesque vista across a backyard peppered with lofty eucalypts. Generously proportioned, the yard contains ample room for an extension (STCA). Fully fenced to enclose the boundary for the safety of pets and children, there's plenty of space to play around a couple of garden sheds beneath the shade of gum trees, if not a coolabah tree too!
It's only a 10 minute bike ride from schools, shopping, train station and other services, plus much faster by car of course. Set deep within a family-oriented, residential neighbourhood, there are so many reasons why this could be the one!

Description:
MODERN FLAIR - WHEN QUALITY & SHEDDING MATTERS!
This is the home where quality, house size & substantial infrastructure meet to create one impressive property. With absolutely nothing to spend further, this is the dream package in a sort after pocket of Kangaroo Flat.
- Less than six years old & built by quality local builder Danny Kelly (Country Homes).
- Configured with four large bedrooms, well positioned with master at the front, with walk in robe & spacious ensuite featuring double vanity.
- Formal front lounge area is spacious and welcoming.
- All secondary bedrooms are quite large & feature built in robes.
- Open plan layout throughout with centrally located kitchen with dining & second living area.
- Well-appointed with quality stainless steel appliances, central large island benchtop with plenty of space for the family to gather.
- Year round comfort is assured with ducted gas heating & ducted evaporative cooling.
- There is so much on offer here with fully landscaped front & rear yards.
- Large undercover entertaining area, where you step up to a secure grassed area yard for pets and the kids.
- Eco-friendly with solar panels (X 26) & 12 kw solar system.
- Every inch of the 726 sq.m allotment has been utilised and designed, with double garage offering access through the side of the block for 3rd & 4th parking areas, this concreted space continues up to the large rear shed (10m X 8m).
- Also offering a carport area to the left of the shed which is approx. (4m x 8m) for the trailer / campervan etc.
Only a short stroll to schools, public transport, playgrounds, cafes & within easy reach to the CBD! This home is family friendly and for the price tag, you will be impressed. This is the one with the room for all the extra toys that need storage & security, look no further, call today to inspect!

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME WITH GREAT SHED!
Loads of space for the whole family is one of the features on offer here. Expansive open plan kitchen/dining/living area, spacious second lounge/rumpus room, larger than average bedroom sizes, heaps of storage options and the bonus of side access to a 6m x 7m shed with a 7m x 3m carport attached are other welcome additions. The location is superb with pre-school, primary & secondary schools all within walking distance, shops, transport & sporting facilities nearby plus the CBD of Bendigo is an easy 10-minute drive away.
The home consists of four generous bedrooms, master with large walk in robe and three-piece ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms are located in the rear wing of the home, all have built in robes, ceiling fans, TV points and share the second bathroom. A separate toilet is nearby for convenience. The true hub of the home is the open plan kitchen/dining/living areas. The kitchen has plenty of bench space & cupboards, electric oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher, walk in pantry, large fridge space and island bench with breakfast bar. The family meals area is adjacent and has room for the largest of dining tables. The living space is carpeted and is a very comfortable place to share with loved ones while relaxing or watching TV.
The rear wing of the home is separated from the front half of the home by a timber sliding door and this is where you will find the second living/rumpus room which allows your family to spread out and enjoy their own space. The younger ones of the family can chill out with their own lounge and TV, study area, maybe a pool table, the options are endless. Other notable internal features are gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, great storage, neutral paint colors, easy care floating timber boards that adorn the floors in the traffic areas and internal access from the two-car garage with auto door.
Outside is a lovely alfresco area that approximately measures a whopping 3m x 13m; a great place for summer BBQ's or just to relax with family & friends. Double gates provide access to a 6m x 7m shed with power and concrete floor and a 3m x 7m attached carport; plenty of room to store all the toys such as the boat, caravan, trailer, extra vehicles or for use as a mancave. Other external features are 27 solar panels that help reduce those pesky power bills, a 2000 litre water tank that is plumbed to the toilets, low maintenance gardens all on an 855M2 block.
It all adds up to a very impressive package for those wanting a home that is big on space inside and out, with all the conveniences you could need close by. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Affordable and in the perfect location
This affordable, spacious 2 bedroom townhouse will have those looking for the perfect investment or first home marking it down for an inspection straight away.
Perfectly placed and located in a quiet street with similar homes around you, this prized home has so many features and benefits.
There is a walk-in robe in the main bedroom and a built-in robe in the 2nd bedroom, plus 3 piece bathroom with separate toilet and a secondary toilet for convenience. There is loads of storage through-out, including in the laundry.
The open-plan kitchen, meals and living room overlooks the untouched courtyard, which is waiting for someone to come in and capitalise, making it their own. Split system heating and cooling for year round comfort, and a single lock up garage with internal access into the home.
Currently let at $270 per week, but can be sold with vacant possession for those first home buyers or investors looking to add to their portfolio. Minutes to public transport, schools, shops and local walking tracks.
